roleset.name: create
roleset.note: MINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mint' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class create-26.4, bunches of other framed members. Comparison with create. (from mint.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: Stock futures trading has minted dozens of millionaires in their 20s and 30s .
example.arg: dozens of millionaires in their 20s and 30s

example.name: more args
example.text: John minted $20 bills from his dirty underwear.
